extendedInfo.description: KSPR-TV 33 is proud to announce a full featured weather app for Android.Featuresâ¢ Highly responsive interactive map optimized for 3G and WiFi performanceâ¢ Vertical and horizontal map display with loopingâ¢ NOWrad, the gold standard for radar in the weather industryâ¢ Highest resolution satellite cloud imagery availableâ¢ Exclusive patent pending Road Weather Indexâ¢ Color coded weather alerts arranged by severityâ¢ Fully integrated GPS for current location awarenessâ¢ Integrated compass overlayâ¢ Most accurate 10 day forecasts with both daily and hourly detailâ¢ Ability to easily save your favorite locationsâ¢ Full featured and user testedâ¢ Weather Widget for unlock pageâ¢ Earthquake Plottingâ¢ Storm Track Plottingâ¢ Tropical Track Plottingâ¢ Status bar alert acknowledgementâ¢ Alerts over map on/off switch in settingsâ¢ Additional Small Widgetâ¢ Widget Configuration (Daily or Hourly view)â¢ Watch/Warning (Alert) boxes on map. â¢ Spanish language support; NOTE: Language used in the app will reflect the overall language being used for the deviceâ¢ Ability to acknowledge Alerts from within the app â¢ Audio, LED, and vibrate for Alert Notifications â¢ Feature tips to help users more fully take advantage of app featuresâ¢ User controllable alerts - Allow the selection of all alerts or just critical alertsâ¢ Single activity scrolling menu

reviews.title: Location accuracy
reviews.comment: It\'s inability to figure out where you are on the map causes some significant lack of confidence
reviews.author: Paul Martin

reviews.title: Problem...
reviews.comment: use to like app but this new version useless..it never shows accurate weather hince weather app..it can b raining n my county and I look on radar and it shows nothing. fix and I can rate hire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but could be better
reviews.comment: This is a great app. I enjoy all the features and warnings the app has but it doesn\'t always update to the correct time. Maybe a refresh button could be created for users to utilize.
reviews.author: Clark Wilson

reviews.title: Will not update!
reviews.comment: When I\'ve open the app lately it keeps saying, \"network connection failed try again.\" D:
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So so
reviews.comment: Like the app but the only way to update the map is force close and reopen, used to just fine....very annoying
reviews.author: Dustin We

reviews.title: It\'s great
reviews.comment: I wouldn\'t be without it!!!
reviews.author: Patrick Moorhead

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Best weather map. Far superior to any other application I\'ve seen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best weather app ever!
reviews.comment: This is the best, most accurate app I\'ve found.  I love the live radar; it\'s accurate and flows without freezing up on screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Upper my rating since some bugs have been fixed. Still fails to load geo data sometimes but otherwise is better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Lived in Missouri, moved to Florida best app anywhere and I have downloaded alot still use KSPR
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use it everywhere I go
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app fit a long time and I keep coming back to it. Best weather app I\'ve found it works every time and provides better info than the name brand ones. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Need to change location name back to cassville not kirksville
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Accurate forecasts. Updated and accurate radar. Alerts keep you informed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Weather app ever I recommend it to everyone good job
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: Very useful Ty guys fr creating this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Handy...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unimpressed with latest update
reviews.comment: I love so many things about this app. It used to be perfect. The last update took away the ability to switch to a different screen while in landscape orientation. Scrolling menu (10-day, hourly, etc.) Is only viewable in portrait mode. I would switch to a different weather app, but the others are either the same developer or way worse. I have a Samsung Epic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app!
reviews.comment: this is a good app but would like to see the wind chill added and be able to zoom on the map
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very handy!
reviews.comment: I like to know what the day looks like and its so nice
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great weather apparently!
reviews.comment: And for those who complain about no zoom feature on the maps,  they need to learn \"pinch to zoom.\"  Duh!
reviews.author: A Google User
